snippet.title: TRLE: The Forbidden Place (2 Endings)
snippet.description:
- 
Name: The Forbidden Place
Author: Leoc1995 - BlackWolfTR - Mahetus
Download: https://trcustoms.org/levels/3421
Game Number: 3421
Data: 16 - Jun - 2022
Type: Tomb Raider 2
Difficulty: Hard

💜 LEVELS: 
1 - 0:01 - Forbidden Place
2 - 30:18 - Temple of SnipingSaix
3 - 1:08:27 - Final trial

💚 SECRETS Total 3:
- FORBIDDEN PLACE
1 - 4:11 - Silver Dragon
2 - 16:44 - Jade Dragon
3 - 29:51 - Gold Dragon

❤️ WEAPONS:
- FORBIDDEN PLACE
16:27 - Automatic Pistols
29:51 - Grenade Launcher

- TEMPLE OF SNIPINGSAIX
43:32 - Uzis

🤍 FILES:
- FORBIDDEN PLACE
10:03 - "2 - Bright green tile can be crushed by something heavy"
10:30 - "2 - Faces lead the direction but be aware of their wrath"
12:28 - "2 - Pressure plates will reveal something from above"
16:08 - "1 - Light will show the right direction"

- TEMPLE OF SNIPINGSAIX
38:57 - "Sometimes you have to shoot to reveal something..."

- FINAL TRIAL
1:24:45 - "Dark green with bronze may save you..."
1:28:29 - "You're too late..... unreadable"

💙 KEY ITEMS:
- FORBIDDEN PLACE
21:42 - Oconic Key
25:26 - Dragon Mask
29:00 - Key of Rustyness

- TEMPLE OF SNIPINGSAIX
45:40 - Leoc1995's Key
46:02 - BlackWolfTR's Key

- FINAL TRIAL
1:10:35 - Steven's Key
1:18:12 - Mystic Plaque
1:21:47 - Mystic Plaque
1:29:36 - Timecatcher's Key
1:33:23 - Dagger of SnipingSaix
